game.name: Blondie Perfect Day
game.description:
Wow! Your favorite Blondie has a plan to marry with her true love so wants to take every possible step to make this day perfect. The lady has a number of things to take care of and you as her best friend take the responsibility of creating the jaw-dropping look for her. You as her personal stylist will guide her to choose the best make up while creating a beautiful wedding outfit. Will you be interested to handle this job? Join Blondie Perfect Day and be prepared to give her an awesome bride look! 

Do not bother when you mix and match multiple beauty products and wedding dresses and accessories as she relies on your fashion abilities a lot. Start it by giving Rapunzel a perfect bride make-up first in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games for girls! Check out all the pairs of contact lenses and see what color of eyes suites on her face! Give her an eye shadow and blush in pastel colors and then select a fun color for her lipstick in this online make-up game! She loves carrying nice mascara and long eye lashes.  

Choose the desired new colors for her hair and then come to the dressing part! Dress her up with a strapless ivory mermaid shaped outfit with awesome embroidery work! You can also give her a pink mini outfit with modern shapes or a white princess style ruffled gown with bows. Make sure to complete her look with the matching small veil, a wonderful bouquet of flowers and a set of precious jewelry in this girls dress up game. Check out our wider collection of free girls dress-up games and allow yourself to have a great time on your mobile phone without download!
